#summary This page provides a listing of Use Cases for the COLORE System.

= COLORE System Use Cases =

  * [Uc1CreateNewClText UC1: Create a new CL text]
  * [Uc2RetrieveListingOfAllClTexts UC2: Retrieve a listing of all CL texts]
  * [Uc3RetrieveMostRecentVersionOfClText UC3: Retrieve most recent version of a CL text]
  * [Uc4RetrieveVersionOfClText UC4: Retrieve a version of a CL text]
  * [Uc5DeleteAllVersionsOfClText UC5: Delete all versions of a CL text]
  * [Uc6DeleteVersionOfClText UC6: Delete a version of a CL text]
  * [Uc7DeleteMostRecentVersionOfClText UC7: Delete the most recent version of a CL text]
